TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeometryHitTestParameters extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestParameters

summary.span: 指定 作为用于命中测试可视化树的参数。

span.span: Specifies a as the parameter to be used for hit testing a visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类, 可以使用值进行命中测试, 以确定是否有任何视觉对象与值相交。 With the class, you can use a value for hit testing, to determine whether any visual object intersects with the value. 还可以通过 创建对象对值进行命中测试。You can also hit test with a value by creating a object. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]命中测试仅在命中测试期间考虑几何图形的填充区域。hit testing only considers the filled area of a geometry during a hit test. 如果创建一个点, 则命中测试不会与任何内容相交, 因为点没有区域。If you create a point , the hit test would not intersect anything because a point has no area. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 方法设置使用的命中测试。The following example shows how to set up a hit test using for the method. 传递给方法的值用于创建对象, 以便扩展命中测试的范围。 `OnMouseDown`The value that is passed to the `OnMouseDown` method is used to create a object in order to expand the range of the hit test. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet10)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet10)] 的 属性提供有关使用作为命中测试参数的命中测试结果的信息。 The property of provides information about the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter. 下图显示了命中测试几何图形 (蓝色圆圈) 与目标对象 (红色正方形) 之间的关系。The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the target object (the red square). ![命中测试中使用的 System.windows.media.geometryhittestresult.intersectiondetail 关系图](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "命中测试中使用的 System.windows.media.geometryhittestresult.intersectiondetail 关系图")![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") 命中测试几何图形与目标对象之间的交集Intersection between hit test geometry and target object

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry geometry) cil managed

param.name: geometry
param.span: 用于命中测试几何图形的 值。

span.span: The value to use for the hit test geometry.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 为方法设置命中测试。The following example shows how to set up a hit test by using for the method. 值用来创建一个对象, 以便在更大的显示区域内展开命中测试的范围。 A value is used to create a object to expand the range of the hit test over a wider display area. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet12)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet12)]
